text: Embrace the gift of Nurgle, for it is a bountiful and loving embrace.
author: Unknown Plaguebearer

text: In death, there is life, and in decay, there is rebirth.
author: Nurgle

text: Blessed are the sick, for they shall be made whole.
author: Nurgle

text: Nurgle's rot is the sweetest perfume in the universe.
author: Unknown Cultist

text: We are all equal in the eyes of Nurgle, for death comes to us all.
author: Unknown Plaguebearer

text: In our decay, we find strength.
author: Nurgle

text: The only certainty in life is death, and Nurgle is its harbinger.
author: Unknown Chaos Champion

text: Nurgle's love is infectious, and I willingly spread it to all.
author: Unknown Plague Marine

text: Embrace decay, for it is the key to true enlightenment.
author: Nurgle

text: To rot is to be reborn in the image of Nurgle.
author: Unknown Plaguebearer

text: The cycle of life and death is but a reflection of Nurgle's eternal joy.
author: Nurgle

text: Pestilence is the true path to enlightenment.
author: Unknown Chaos Sorcerer

text: Nurgle's gifts are a testament to his boundless generosity.
author: Unknown Plague Marine

text: We are the chosen of Nurgle, and our suffering is his delight.
author: Unknown Chaos Champion

text: In decay, we find solace.
author: Nurgle

text: Nurgle's putrid embrace is the ultimate solace.
author: Unknown Plaguebearer

text: To serve Nurgle is to know the true meaning of contentment.
author: Unknown Plague Marine

text: In decay, we find solace.
author: Nurgle

text: Nurgle's putrid embrace is the ultimate solace.
author: Unknown Plaguebearer

text: To serve Nurgle is to be a beacon of hope in a decaying galaxy.
author: Unknown Plague Marine

text: In the embrace of Nurgle, even death is a joyful reunion.
author: Unknown Cultist

text: The Plague Father's touch is a gift beyond measure.
author: Unknown Plague Marine

text: To witness the blooming of a plague is to see Nurgle's artistry in action.
author: Unknown Chaos Sorcerer

text: Pestilence and plague are the truest forms of communion with Nurgle.
author: Unknown Chaos Champion

text: In decay, we find solace.
author: Nurgle

text: Nurgle's putrid embrace is the ultimate solace.
author: Unknown Plaguebearer

text: To serve Nurgle is to be a beacon of hope in a decaying galaxy.
author: Unknown Plague Marine

text: In the grip of plague, we are reborn.
author: Nurgle

text: Nurgle's blessings are the greatest treasures in the universe.
author: Unknown Cultist

text: The cycle of life and death is the ultimate expression of Nurgle's love.
author: Unknown Chaos Sorcerer

text: Our suffering is a gift from Nurgle, and we revel in it.
author: Unknown Chaos Champion

text: Embrace decay, for it is the key to true enlightenment.
author: Nurgle

text: In the filth and decay, we find purity.
author: Unknown Plaguebearer

text: Nurgle's love is the most contagious of all.
author: Unknown Plague Marine

text: In the garden of decay, we are the cherished blooms.
author: Nurgle

text: The Plague Father's gifts are an eternal source of joy.
author: Unknown Plague Marine

text: To wither and rot is to be truly alive.
author: Nurgle

text: In the face of death, we find purpose.
author: Unknown Chaos Sorcerer

text: Nurgle's decay is the bridge to salvation.
author: Nurgle

text: The sweetest nectar is the pus of Nurgle's blessings.
author: Unknown Plaguebearer

text: We are the heralds of Nurgle's eternal joy.
author: Unknown Plague Marine

text: In the putrid mire, we find our strength.
author: Unknown Cultist

text: Nurgle's garden is a testament to his boundless love.
author: Nurgle

text: In the rot and decay, we find renewal.
author: Unknown Chaos Sorcerer

text: Nurgle's embrace is a refuge from the harshness of the universe.
author: Unknown Chaos Champion

text: To serve the Plague God is to be reborn in the embrace of filth.
author: Nurgle

text: In our suffering, we find beauty.
author: Unknown Plaguebearer

text: Nurgle's gifts are the ultimate salvation.
author: Unknown Plague Marine

text: In the pestilence, we are made whole.
author: Unknown Cultist

text: To decay is to be touched by Nurgle's grace.
author: Nurgle

text: The cycle of life and death is the grandest of symphonies, and Nurgle is its composer.
author: Unknown Chaos Sorcerer

text: Our pain is a testament to our devotion to the Lord of Decay.
author: Unknown Chaos Champion

text: Nurgle's love is the ultimate source of strength.
author: Nurgle

text: In the plague-ridden soil, we are reborn.
author: Unknown Plaguebearer

text: Nurgle's blessings are the cure for all that ails the soul.
author: Unknown Plague Marine

text: In our suffering, we are made complete.
author: Unknown Cultist

text: To decay is to be truly blessed.
author: Nurgle

text: Nurgle's garden is the truest paradise.
author: Unknown Chaos Sorcerer

text: Our pain is a gift, and we cherish it.
author: Unknown Chaos Champion
